features: 【Extra Tall 51" Adjustable Tripod】With 7-section adjustable telescopic poles, the phone selfie stick tripod stand is tall enough, can be adjusted from 11in to 64in. Therefore, this selfie stick for iPhone can capture a wider landscape and meet the needs of people who want to have different shoot heights and apply it in different scenes, even for the tall man. Suitable for selfies, vlog, live streaming, group photos and more.

【Reinforced Tripod Base】Very easy to use, just press the button on the bottom to unlock three legs of the tripod for iphone. The base of the newly upgraded cellphone tripod adopts a reinforced design with a silicone non-slip foot pad, which is more stable after unfolding and is not easy to shake. Note: In the tripod mode, the phone must be placed in the center of the sliding track, which is consistent with the center of gravity of the tripod to avoid tipping.

【Versatile 3 in 1 Design & Stable Base】Can be used as an extendable tripod for phone & selfie stick & phone floor stand. This tripod for iPhone/Android can be quickly switched between the table tripod and selfie stick mode, also can be placed on the floor to take videos to provide photographers more convenience. Built-in collapsible long legs and non-slip feet pads make the base lager and more stable. Besides, the handle of tripod for cell phone adopts a streamlined design with a matte texture to increase the comfort of use.

【Chargeable Remote Shutter】The tripod for phone has a built-in rechargeable wireless remote control,supports shooting within 10m,is compatible with IOS/Android,quickly realizes pairing, and the operation is very simple.When the remote control is not in use,it can be put into the special remote control slot on the handle of the selfie stick for iphone to prevent it from being lost.The mount range of the tripod phone holder is about 2.28-3.46inch in size, which is suitable for 4-7'' phones.

【Compact Size & Travel Friendly】After being folded, the cell phone tripod stand is only 12.2 inches, so it can be easily packed in your bag, backpack or suitcase without taking up more space. Compact size makes the phone tripod a perfect choice for traveling, hiking or camping.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Selfie stick for iphone with remote

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, portable and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Works great and is very easy to carry around. One of my concerns is that the tripod shouldn’t shake easily when placed outdoors and this one does a good job with that. Very small and light, so easy to snuck into your bag during travel. Overall pleased with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and use. Durable.
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed about this tripod is its weight. It is travel size and compact; it weights about 13.8oz. This tripod is simple to setup. You push the "Push" button at the bottom/base of the tripod and it unlocks or releases the three legs. You then hold the body with one hand and pull upward with the other hand to extend the body. It extends to 52.5 inches. There is a wireless remote attached to the body that you pair with your phone. It also comes with a micro USB cable to charge the remote. For the price, it's not a bad product. Do note, I haven't taken this outdoor, but I suspect on a very windy day that it can get knocked over as it's not heavy and sturdy enough to uphold itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Microphone For The Price!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this on a whim before our trip to Hawaii to do some vlogging and live streaming out there. I was adamant at first because of the old saying "you get what you pay for" . However, when I got there and did some live streaming from the beach on TikTok, these mics sounded nice (my audience confirmed the sound when asked)! I used the wind proof attachment of course and it lessened wind background sound which helped a lot while talking.These mics are compact and easy to use. Simply plug in the remote on the bottom of your phone and pair. That's it. My wife and I used each mic while streaming and could not be any more happier! The mic was also good for recording ASMR things like a waterfall, creeks and beach waves. Usually I use the built in mic on my iPhone but I ended up placing one of the mics on a piece of driftwood with my camera mounted a few feet away and it picked things up nicely.Pleasantly surprised with the quality considering the price. I recommend this if you blog on the go and need a cheap yet quality option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: works well, love the mount itself, use it on all my trips and was even used when i got engaged😂 the clicker though, can be a bit flakey, but phone can always be set in a timer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More sturdy than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I needed to make a movie for a school project using my phone. This stand worked out great. The stand is sturdy. I was filling outside and I didn’t have to worry about tipping over as long as I placed it on a moderately flat surface. But, one of the coolest things is how compact you can fold it for transporting, Because of this I was able to just threw it in my bag. It didn’t add much additional weight either. I would highly recommend this stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how small and compact this tripod it. I'm able to just drop it in my bag. I lost the remote at some point which was a bummer because it was super convenient. I will probably get another one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Concept Yet Not SO Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I like the idea of the item and it's portability. However, it is on the flimsy side and you have to be careful that the cell phone holder, in the horizontal position, is tilted to the left to ensure stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Cellphone Holder!
reviews.reviewText: This cell phone holder is excellent. I used it when recording an event. It's stable and records a great presentation without any jerking or shifting, unlike when holding a cell phone by hand. I let my friends and associates know when to get one!
